fields.description: Currently, the {{PHPickerViewController}} is only used if the target is iOS 14 and {{allowMultiple}} is set to {{true}}. To benefit from the improved user experience of the picker, it should always be used if the target is iOS 14+, even if {{allowMultiple}} is set to {{false}}.
fields.summary: iOS: PHPickerViewController should always be used on iOS 14+
